name: Nova Initiative
description:
Get ready to take on the universe as a skilled pilot for the Nova Initiative! Embark on a thrilling journey through uncharted territories of space, but beware: the galaxy is teeming with treacherous foes and perilous obstacles. Strap in, pilot, and get ready for the adventure of a lifetime! 

Our final project for our game development class!

Made by Cass Suarez, Ian Stocker, Elizabeth Adams, and Michael Wassom

Music by Lupus Nocte
